titles.title: An original concurrent resolution to allow another member of the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate to serve on the Joint Committee on the Library in place of the Chairman of the Committee.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 1/28/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Chairman of the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to designate another member of the Committee to serve on the Joint Committee of the Congress on the Library in his or her place.
